page.title: 05Thursday Cottage in Spaxton.
page.content: Thursday Cottage owned by Mr. and Mrs. Kunzli has a small factory to the rear where marmalades and preserves are produced. Six part time workers are employed there. Each different preserve is produced in small quantities as a housewife would make it. Fruit is bought from the surrounding farms and wholesalers. 8,000 jars are produced each week. Sold to Health Food shops ,Gift shops,and high class stores. They export to Denmark and France. They specialize in diabetic preserves. The marmalade is made to a secret Austrian recipe.
